          <title>
            <string language="en">Speed and distance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschwindigkeit und Abstand</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vitesse et distance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Velocidade e distância</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Velocità e distanza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταχύτητα και απόσταση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Velocidad y distancia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows police officers walking a distance of 60 metres in 30 seconds at a steady speed.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">time</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt gehenden Polizeioffiziere 
die Abstand von 60 Metern in 30 Sekunden mit einer unveränderlichen 
Geschwindigkeit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre des officiers de police
marchant une distance de 60 mètres en 30 secondes à une vitesse 
régulière.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os oficiais de polícias
que andam a uma distância de 60 medidores em 30 segundos em uma 
velocidade constante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra gli ufficiali di 
polizia che camminano una distanza di 60 tester in 30 secondi ad una 
velocità costante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει αστυνομικούς που 
περπατούν μια απόσταση 60 μέτρων σε 30 δευτερόλεπτα με μια 
σταθερή ταχύτητα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a oficiales de policía
que recorren una distancia de 60 contadores en 30 segundos a una 
velocidad constante.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschwindigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
